Text:
Need a seeder.....  keep it going....

Thanks

There's only one seed at the moment so when I stop seeding, the seeding stops. It resumes when I start again. It isn't always convenient for me to keep the machine running (and, therefore to keep seeding) continuously. Once more than one person can seed I am sure that the availability will improve.

Marthafar,
I have a problem with the audio. The sound in the main menu is ok but when it switcher over to the episodes there is no sound. 
Could you check this please?

Thanks!

Have you found audio problems on other any of the other discs or is it just this one? As far as I'm aware, they are all OK, but I will check things again, just to be sure, and will report back. Apologies for any disconvenience.
Yep! No sound on these episodes, just on the main menu. The other discs are o.k.

Apologies for the glitch. I'll see if I can fix it, or else I'll re-author from scratch; either way I will upload a new iso. However, it may be a week before I can attend to it as other demands are piling up.
I also noticed the audio problem with this one. Is there a fixed iso available?
Downloaded 9-12 twice and no sound anyone got an alternative or a solution?
